com.pega.pegarules.pub.clipboard.mapping

Interface ClipboardDataStreamMapper


  • public interface ClipboardDataStreamMapper
    ClipboardDataStreamMapper provides API for deserializing and serializing the clipboard structure to data stream, for example JSON stream.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String VERSION

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(ClipboardPage page,
                 java.io.Reader dataStreamSource)
        Populates the provided clipboard page with the contents in the data stream. This method auto maps the data stream on to the clipboard page.

        Parameters:
        page -
        dataStreamSource -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Invalid input for dataStreamSource
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Parsing input data entered an illegal state
        PRRuntimeException - Runtime errors mapping the input

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(ClipboardProperty property,
                 java.io.Reader dataStreamSource)
        Populates the provided clipboard property with the contents in the data stream. Use this method if top level list (e.g. JSON arrays) need to be mapped to a clipboard page list.

        This method auto maps the data stream on to the clipboard page.

        Parameters:
        property -
        dataStreamSource -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Invalid input for dataStreamSource
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Parsing input data entered an illegal state
        PRRuntimeException - Runtime errors mapping the input

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(ClipboardPage page,
                 java.io.Reader dataStreamSource,
                 EntityMap map)
        Populates the provided clipboard page with the contents in the data stream according to the mapping specified in the map parameter.

        Use getEntityMapBuilder() to create a map.

        Parameters:
        page -
        dataStreamSource -
        map -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Invalid input for dataStreamSource
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Parsing input data entered an illegal state
        PRRuntimeException - Runtime errors mapping the input

      • deserialize

        void deserialize(ClipboardProperty property,
                 java.io.Reader dataStreamSource,
                 EntityMap map)
        Populates the provided clipboard property with the contents in the data stream according to the mapping specified in the map parameter. Use this method if top level list (e.g. JSON arrays) need to be mapped to a clipboard page list.

        Use getEntityMapBuilder() to create a map.

      • serialize

        void serialize(ClipboardPage page,
               java.io.Writer dataStreamTarget)
        Converts and writes the clipboard page contents into the provided data stream target. This method auto maps the page contents on to the stream.
        Parameters:
        page -
        dataStreamTarget -
        Throws:
        PRRuntimeException - runtime issues with data stream generation

      • serialize

        void serialize(ClipboardProperty property,
               java.io.Writer dataStreamTarget)
        Converts and writes the clipboard property contents into the provided data stream target. This method auto maps the page contents on to the stream. Use this method if a page list needs to be converted to a top level list (e.g. JSON array)
